org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class CustomCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.CustomCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.mini2Dx.gdx.InputProcessor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LibgdxCustomCursor

    public abstract class CustomCursor
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.mini2Dx.gdx.InputProcessor
    Base class for implementing an InputProcessor that sets a custom mouse cursor image based on the mouse state.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomCursor

        public CustomCursor(Pixmap upPixmap,
                    Pixmap downPixmap,
                    int xHotspot,
                    int yHotspot)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        upPixmap - The image to use in the mouse button up state
        downPixmap - The image to use in the mouse button down state
        xHotspot - The x location of the hotspot pixel within the cursor image (origin top-left corner)
        yHotspot - The y location of the hotspot pixel within the cursor image (origin top-left corner)
